page.title: 16Warslow Village Hall
page.content: Warslow village hall is used by quite a number of people. All village meetings are held there. The youth club, which was started in 1977 is held there every Monday evening. About 20-30 people from the age of 9 to 16 attend each week and play table tennis or snooker, buy a soft drink or just talk to their friends. Bingo sessions are held on alternate Wednesdays. Warslow Silver Band practise every Sunday from 7p.m. until 9p.m. in the village hall. There are 11 members and they play at local Wakes and Galas and in local pubs. In 1985 all the windows and curtains were replaced with new ones and the building was decorated.
